例文: The view from the mountain was amazing.
She started her career as a teacher.

意味: 飛躍する、急に成功する
例文: Her music career took off after she won the contest.
He wore a superhero costume to the party.
This problem relates to our project.
I like reading science fiction novels.

意味: ロマンティック・コメディ
例文: We watched a romantic comedy last night.
She prepared for the test by studying every day.
His parents are proud of his achievements.
If you work hard, you can succeed.
